channel.title: capa on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in capa on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Hacking on CAPA - The journey of implementing a nontrivial feature in a barely known codebase
item.description: Hacking on CAPA - The journey of implementing a nontrivial feature in a barely known codebase Hello Dear readers. Today, I would like to write about a project I’ve been working on these past months or so. This is a longer story and hopefully an interesting one to read. I’m going to write about the journey I took while trying to implement IPv6 based Kubernetes cluster for CAPA and EKS.
